about_the_game:
What begins as a harmless firefly-catching contest for Cooper’s project quickly takes a dark turn. Mysterious forces have invaded Wadsroad, draining its light and shrouding it in eerie shadows. Set discovers that the only way to fight these dark invaders is with Cooper’s special camera.

With Wadsroad's fate hanging in the balance, Set must embark on a thrilling journey to restore the town’s lost light. Equipped with Cooper’s camera, Set will face a series of challenges and uncover hidden secrets to push back the encroaching darkness. Each use of the camera is a key part of the adventure, helping Set reveal truths and fend off the malevolent shadows.

Can Set save Wadsroad from being consumed by darkness, or will the town be lost to the shadows? Join Set in this exciting adventure to bring light back to a world in peril.

Blue Shutter is a captivating 2.5D/pixel art adventure game that invites players into a rich storyline crafted with mystery and excitement. Key features include:

Engaging Combat System: Utilize a unique combat mechanic that employs camera flashes to battle dark orbs and reclaim stolen light.

Reveal Hidden Energy in the Dark Room: Develop photos to extract orb energy, uncover clues, and weaken shadows in your quest.

Intriguing Quests and Diverse Characters: Encounter a variety of characters and embark on quests that drive a compelling storyline, filled with twists and turns.

In game phone apps: Text, play mini games, check your credit card balance, buy groceries through the app

Exploration and Discovery: Venture into new areas, including the enigmatic forest, uncover hidden secrets, and engage with the environment in meaningful ways.

Fishing and Cooking: Discover and unlock recipes for mysterious items, and fish types to trade at Pepito's Fish Market, adding depth and variety to the gameplay.
